overview_of_class: This class covers the following topics: Laws of thermodynamics, thermochemistry, chemical potentials, and solution thermodynamics.
name: Thermodynamics
title: WCAS CHEM 342-1-20 Thermodynamics

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This class covers the following topics: Laws of thermodynamics, thermochemistry, chemical potentials, and solution thermodynamics.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
"Physical Chemistry" by Peter Atkins, 9th edition, Freeman Press ($186.65 new; $140.00 used)*

MUST BE 9th EDITION-NO OTHER EDITION IS ACCEPTABLE

*Prices as listed by the Norris Bookstore on 6/23/16. Prices offered by other vendors may be lower.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Suggested)
descriptions.value:
Solutions Manual for Physical Chemistry by Peter Atkins & Julio dePaula, 9th edition ($64.00 new; $48.00 used)*

*Prices as listed by the Norris Bookstore on 6/23/16. Prices offered by other vendors may be lower.
